name: Reckless Crime Gangs of Grand City Mafia Free
name_original: Reckless Crime Gangs of Grand City Mafia Free
description:
Welcome to the streets of Grand City, where notorious crime lords and mafia bosses rule the streets! In this epic power struggle to control Grand City, you must navigate to the dangerous terrain and take out enemy gang members.

Using an arcade gameplay, collect money while dodging dangerous traps and rival gangsters. Roam the streets and unlock cool new characters to play with!
